nett <Caroline.Bennett@chalhoub.com>; Nasser Alblooshi <Nasser.Alblooshi@chalhoub.com>; Aaiza Zafar <Aaiza.Zafar@chalhoub.com>
Subject: RSO UAE - NEW STORE OPENING | Jil Sander - Mall Of Emirates 
 

Dear All, 

 

It is our pleasure to announce the opening of Jil Sander – Mall OF Emirates.

 

The boutique team started welcoming its Guests on the 07th Mar 2025 at 10am.

 

Another amazing teamwork from all team members involved in this project : 

 

*	Brand team, @Lorand RETTY <mailto:Lorand.Retty@chalhoub.com>  @Jil Sander Mall Of the Emirates <mailto:JilSander.MallOftheEmirates@chalhoub.com>  @Kevin Issac <mailto:Kevin.Issac@chalhoub.com>  @Bonsu Prempeh <mailto:Bonsu.Prempeh@chalhoub.com> 
*	IT team @Rizaldy Amada <mailto:Rizaldy.Amada@chalhoub.com> @Real Emirates - IT <mailto:RealEmirates-IT@chalhoub.com> 
*	Admin team @Connie Madeira <mailto:Connie.Madeira@chalhoub.com>  @Lorena Dimaala <mailto:Lorena.Dimaala@chalhoub.com> @Mary Janice Dofeliz <mailto:MaryJanice.Dofeliz@chalhoub.com>  @Hagop Ghazarian <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> 
*	Maintenance team @Shibu Janardhanan <mailto:Shibu.Janardhanan@chalhoub.com> @Sreeraj Prakasam <mailto:Sreeraj.Prakasam@chalhoub.com> 
*	GA team @Mohammed El Neel <mailto:Mohammed.Elneel@chalhoub.com> @Mahmoud Abd Hamid <mailto:Mahmoud.Khedr@chalhoub.com> @Salwa Al Mamari <mailto:Salwa.Almamari@chalhoub.com>  @Sharon Pinto <mailto:Sharon.Pinto@chalhoub.com> 
*	Accounts @Ghouse Khan <mailto:Ghouse.Khan2@chalhoub.com>  @Mohamed Rauf <mailto:Mohamed.Rauf@chalhoub.com> 
*	Logistics / Warehouse @Sredha Mathai <mailto:Sredha.Mathai@chalhoub.com> @Real UAE - Logistics - Distribution <mailto:RealUAE-Logistics-Distribution@mailmac.net> 
*	Group Security @Rawad Hossein <mailto:Rawad.Hossein@chalhoub.com>  @Ahmed Eltahan <mailto:Ahmed.Eltahan@chalhoub.com> @Philip Abdou <mailto:Philip.abdou@chalhoub.com> @Group Security Control Room <mailto:GroupSecurityControlRoom@chalhoub.com> 
*	3d TEAM : @Prathap Pandiyan <mailto:Prathap.Pandiyan@3d-consultants.com>
